title: Afternoon Yak
description: Four women from varying backgrounds discuss difficult topics, current events, and speak with guests.
altHero: a talk show set with four women sitting around a coffee table
alt1: an older woman addresses the camera
alt2: Marge and Homer Simpson talk with another host
alt4: an angry Milhouse and his mother walk through a door and a chyron says “My son still wets the bed”
